projects.title: Code Fellows Final Project
projects.description: This was the final project I developed at Code Fellows Bootcamp.

projects.title: Support Knowledge Base
projects.description: DigitalOcean's first public support knowledge base. I developed, wrote, and managed this project to life to give our support team a new tool to deflect support tickets. It involved developing a new genre style of documentation, managing internal contributing writers, creating a new sections of the docs site to display the articles, and ongoing curation of the content. I'm very proud of it.

projects.title: Dead Simple Synth
projects.description: Dead Simple Synth is a webapp that allows you to play a simple synthesizer through your browser. I hand-coded the project in HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. The app also uses the very excellent Tone.JS audio framework.
